Alas, the end of term has arrived, and for many of us this means heading home and getting a good week or two of rest.</p>

For others though, this means that it is carolling time!</p>

The dates we have for carolling this year are:</p>

TUESDAY 6th DECEMBER</strong>- St Patrick's Square, the turning on of the lights, with our very own brass ensemble. 6pm.</em></h4>

TUESDAY 13th DECEMBER</strong> - The Pear Tree at 6pm.</em></h4>

FRIDAY 16th DECEMBER</strong> - Meadows Carols for St Catharine's Homeless Project at 4pm. Meet on the Compass on the bottom of Middle Meadow Way, with an empty jam jar and tea-light. Facebook event here</a>.</em></h4>

SUNDAY 18th DECEMBER</strong> - Princes Street (on junction with Frederick Street called "Busker East") at 6pm.</em></h4>

For those of you with ongoing exams, best of luck, and for all Musocers: see you next semester!</p>

Whether you are in Edinburgh or not, the Edinburgh University Music Society wishes you a very Merry Christmas!</strong></em></h5>
